title: Add Shopping Item with Correct Price Conversion
description: Verify that adding a new shopping item updates the item list correctly and calculates the price based on the latest BCV exchange rates.

steps.description: Navigate to the main calculator interface.
Add a new shopping item with a specified price in a foreign currency.
Ensure the item appears in the shopping list with correct converted price in local currency.
Verify the total price updates accordingly reflecting the new item.

title: Remove Shopping Item and Update Totals
description: Ensure that removing a shopping item updates the list accordingly and recalculates the total prices correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the calculator interface with multiple items already added.
Remove one of the shopping items.
Confirm the removed item is deleted from the list.
Verify the total price updates and no longer includes the removed item's cost.

title: Update Shopping Item Quantity and Price
description: Check that updating the quantity or price of an existing shopping item recalculates the total and conversion correctly.

steps.description: Select an existing shopping item in the calculator.
Modify the quantity and/or price of the item.
Verify the item reflects the updated quantity and price.
Ensure the total price and converted amounts are updated to reflect changes.

title: Fetch and Display Live BCV Exchange Rates
description: Validate that the system fetches the latest BCV exchange rates successfully and displays them with historical data and delta indicators.

steps.description: Open the exchange rates section or related interface feature.
Verify that the latest BCV exchange rates are fetched and displayed.
Confirm the presence of historical rates and correct calculation and display of the delta changes.

title: Handle BCV Exchange Rate Fetch Failure Gracefully
description: Test the system's error handling when BCV exchange rate API is unreachable or returns invalid data.

steps.description: Simulate BCV exchange rate API failure or invalid response.
Check that the system shows a user-friendly error message or fallback UI indication.
Ensure the calculator still operates with last known or default rates if available.

title: Activate Savara AI Voice Interaction and Receive Real-Time Feedback
description: Verify that users can trigger voice interaction with Savara AI and receive immediate feedback through voice status indicators and responses.

steps.description: Activate Savara AI voice assistant feature.
Speak a shopping-related command or question.
Confirm that the voice status indicator shows active listening and processing.
Ensure the AI returns a relevant response both visually and audibly.

title: Use Savara AI Text Chat and Verify Responses
description: Ensure that users can interact with Savara AI through text chat and receive timely, contextually appropriate suggestions or answers.

steps.description: Open Savara AI chat interface.
Input a text query related to shopping assistance.
Verify the AI provides a timely and relevant text reply.

title: Handle Savara AI Interaction Errors
description: Test the AI assistant's behavior and error messages when the Gemini API is unreachable or returns errors.

steps.description: Simulate Gemini API failure or invalid response during AI interaction.
Check that the system displays a clear error message or fallback response.
Ensure the application remains responsive and stable.

title: User Identity Persistence and Profile Sync across Devices
description: Verify that a generated machine ID is consistent and that user profiles sync correctly across multiple devices without data loss.

steps.description: Log in or set up a user profile on Device A.
Add and modify shopping items and settings.
Log in with the same user on Device B.
Confirm that the machine ID remains consistent or is properly linked.
Verify all shopping data and user settings synchronize to Device B accurately.

title: Generate Machine ID on New Device
description: Confirm that a new unique machine ID is generated for users accessing the app on a new or unrecognized device.

steps.description: Launch the app on a new device that has not previously been used.
Verify a new unique machine ID is generated and associated with the user's profile.

title: UI Verification Against Liquid Glass Design and Mobile-First Accessibility
description: Validate that the user interface adheres to the liquid glass aesthetic with glassmorphism effects, luminous teal/green highlights, and is fully accessible on mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the app on various mobile devices with different screen sizes.
Verify the UI displays fluid glassmorphism effects and luminous highlights as per design specs.
Confirm text is highly legible, headers are large for quick totals visibility, and all thumb-zone placements are optimized.
Check accessibility features including screen reader compatibility and color contrast.

title: Subtle Animations and Immediate Visual Feedback on User Interaction
description: Ensure all user interactions trigger subtle animations and visual feedback quickly to maintain a smooth, intuitive experience.

steps.description: Perform common user interactions such as adding/removing items, toggling AI assistant, and updating quantities.
Verify subtle animations appear on each interaction.
Confirm immediate and clear visual feedback without lag or distraction.

title: Calculate Total Price with No Shopping Items
description: Test that when no shopping items are added, the total price is displayed as zero and the calculator behaves gracefully.

steps.description: Start the app with an empty shopping list.
Verify that the total price displayed is zero or an appropriate empty state message.
Ensure no errors occur and UI remains stable.

title: Handle Large Number of Shopping Items
description: Ensure the calculator and UI can handle and render a large number of shopping items without performance degradation or layout issues.

steps.description: Add a large number (e.g., 100+) of shopping items with varied prices.
Confirm all items are listed correctly.
Verify total price and price conversion calculations are accurate and updated.
Check that app performance and UI responsiveness remain acceptable.

title: Verify Delta Updates on Exchange Rate Changes
description: Validate that when BCV exchange rates change, the delta indicators reflect the correct positive or negative changes promptly.

steps.description: Simulate or wait for an updated BCV exchange rate.
Verify the displayed delta indicator updates with correct direction and magnitude.

title: Ensure Synchronization Does Not Overwrite More Recent Data
description: Verify that when syncing profiles across devices, more recent shopping data is not overwritten by outdated data from other devices.

steps.description: Modify shopping items on Device A and wait briefly.
Modify shopping items on Device B with different data shortly after.
Trigger sync on both devices.
Confirm that the profile data reflects the most recent changes accurately across both devices.
